job title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst at Glens Falls Hospital
city state: – United States Glens Falls, New York
job description:
Job Description
The Senior Business Intelligence Analyst collaborates with key internal stakeholders across all organizations to develop and execute client-facing research from methodology, design, data collection, analysis, and closed-loop action planning. You'll have the responsibility for writing and troubleshooting reports, managing multiple projects involving analytics at various points in time and coordinating with associates. The ability to manage time, work collaboratively, be responsive, and visualize quantitative and qualitative findings in PPT are key skill sets.

You will consult with business stakeholders to understand their needs, make recommendations, and manage each client research request from start to finish. In this role you, will be an expert in survey design and be visualizing results and articulating insights to stakeholders. You will analyze complex business problems and issues using data to provide insight to decision makers The Senior Business Intelligence Analyst will serve as the key resource to stakeholders for their client research needs.
Qualifications
Basic Qualifications
  • Bachelor's Degree, or equivalent relevant work experience
  • At least 2 year of business analytics work experience

Preferred Qualifications
  • Bachelor's Degree in business/ finance, market research, psychology, statistics or math
  • 2+ years of Tableau visualization and development experience
  • 2+ years of experience, meeting with stakeholders to define report requirements, presenting and interpreting data to executive level
  • 2+ years of experience writing SQL queries
  • 2+ years of intermediate to expert level Excel skills
